name: Shinkai: Team Activities and Quotes
description: Generates recommended team activities and inspirational quotes based on team size, project type, and management style
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: team_activities
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE team_activities (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, team_size INT NOT NULL, project_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, management_style VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlTables.name: inspirational_quotes
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE inspirational_quotes (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, quote TEXT NOT NULL, management_style VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get team activities by team size and project type
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM team_activities WHERE team_size = :team_size AND project_type = :project_type

sqlQueries.name: Get inspirational quotes by management style
sqlQueries.query: SELECT quote FROM inspirational_quotes WHERE management_style LIKE '%' || :management_style || '%'
